protein.specific_function: Acts as a suppressor of the SAPK signaling pathways by associating with and dephosphorylating MAP3K7/TAK1 and MAP3K5, and by attenuating the association between MAP3K7/TAK1 and MAP2K4 or MAP2K6.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds
transmembrane receptor protein serine/threonine kinase signaling pathway

reference.reference_text: Jin F, Ji C, Liu L, Dai J, Gu S, Sun X, Xie Y, Mao Y: Molecular cloning and characterization of a novel human protein phosphatase 2C cDNA (PP2C epsilon*). Mol Biol Rep. 2004 Sep;31(3):197-202.
